entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
